Name: iOS/tvOS via Adobe Launch
Adobe Analytics SDK: For iOS & tvOS, you do not need to download any specific SDK. DSAS will configure the Adobe Analytics Extensions in Adobe Launch. Please reach out to DSAS for the code needed for implementation.
Install Adobe Analytics SDK: This will be provided along with the code needed for implementation
Lifecycle:
Please follow this link to view Lifecycle implementation instructions: https://developer.adobe.com/client-sdks/documentation/mobile-core/lifecycle/

Please follow this link for details to add Custom Context Variables to Lifecycle Calls: https://developer.adobe.com/client-sdks/documentation/mobile-core/lifecycle/ios/#collecting-additional-data-with-lifecycle
Pages/Screens: Please follow this link to view Screen implementation instructions: https://developer.adobe.com/client-sdks/documentation/mobile-core/api-reference/#trackstate
Track Action: Please follow this link to view Click implementation instructions: https://developer.adobe.com/client-sdks/documentation/mobile-core/api-reference/#trackaction
Media SDK: For iOS & tvOS, you do not need to download any specific SDK. DSAS will configure the Media Extension in Adobe Launch. Please reach out to DSAS for the code needed for implementation.
Install Media SDK: This will be provided along with the code needed for implementation
Media Methods Documentation: Please follow this link to view instructions on the Media Analytics Methods: https://developer.adobe.com/client-sdks/documentation/adobe-media-analytics/api-reference/#media-api-reference

Name: Web/Javascript via Adobe Launch
Adobe Analytics SDK: For Javascript based apps, you do not need to download any specific SDK. DSAS will configure the Adobe Analytics Extensions in Adobe Launch. Please reach out to DSAS for the code needed inside the <head> tag.
Install Adobe Analytics SDK: This will be provided along with the code needed for implementation
Pages/Screens:
Please follow this link to view Page implementation instructions: https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/analytics/implementation/vars/functions/t-method.html?lang=en#page-view-tracking-call-using-the-adobe-analytics-extension 

Note: the s.t() call should be made after the Launch script has been loaded
Track Action:
Please follow this link to view Click implementation instructions: https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/analytics/implementation/vars/functions/tl-method.html?lang=en#s.tl()-method-in-appmeasurement-and-the-analytics-extension-custom-code-editor 

Note: the s.tl() call should be made after the Launch script has been loaded
Media SDK: For Javascript based apps, you do not need to download any specific SDK. DSAS will configure the Media Extension in Adobe Launch. Please reach out to DSAS for the code needed for implementation.
Install Media SDK:
Please follow the instructions in the following link on how to implement Media tracking: 
https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/experience-platform/tags/extensions/client/media-analytics-3x/overview.html?lang=en#using-from-a-webpage%2Fjs-app
Media Methods Documentation: Please follow this link to view instructions on the Media Analytics Methods: https://adobe-marketing-cloud.github.io/media-sdks/reference/javascript_3x/APIReference.html

Name: Roku
Adobe Analytics SDK:
Please follow this link to download the Roku Adobe Analytics & Media SDK:  https://github.com/Adobe-Marketing-Cloud/media-sdks/releases/tag/roku-v2.2.6

Note: 
Make sure the following values are set in the “ADBMobileConfig.json” Config file
“offlineEnabled”: false
“privacyDefault”: “optedin”

If "offlineEnabled": true, the hit will be discarded and not processed for reporting
 If "privacyDefault": "optedout" is set, then the hit will not be processed, and will not show up in reporting
Install Adobe Analytics SDK: Please follow this link to view the Roku Adobe Analytics Implementation details: https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/media-analytics/using/implementation/media-sdk/setup/ott-setup/set-up-roku.html?lang=en#mobile-library-%2F-sdk-implementation
Pages/Screens: Please follow this link to view Screen implementation instructions: https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/media-analytics/using/media-use-cases/analytics-with-ott/track-app-states.html?lang=en#roku
Track Action: Please follow this link to view Click implementation instructions: https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/media-analytics/using/media-use-cases/analytics-with-ott/track-app-actions.html?lang=en
Media SDK: Please follow this link to download the Roku Adobe Analytics & Media SDK: https://github.com/Adobe-Marketing-Cloud/media-sdks/releases/tag/roku-v2.2.6
Install Media SDK: Please follow the instructions in the following link on how to implement Media tracking: https://experienceleague.adobe.com/docs/media-analytics/using/implementation/media-sdk/setup/ott-setup/set-up-roku.html?lang=en#mobile-library-%2F-sdk-implementation
Products: Fox Local Roku,Fox Weather App Roku
